name: Site Apocalemur: Town of Missing People
name_original: Site Apocalemur: Town of Missing People
description:
The player, Callum Fields, has lost their newlywed, Yasuda Nana. In a desperate effort to find her, he has taken the advice of an anonymous source from a forum and travelled to a city known for locating lost people. This game focuses on interaction, dialog and exploration as the story is unraveled to the player.

Inspired by the SCP Foundation - SCP 599

===Credits===

This game was done as a solo project.

Titlescreen Music - FNF Lullaby Mod SOUNDTRACK

In-Game Music - 432Hz Frequency | Relaxing Morning Meditation | Mountain Ambience | 15 Minutes

Voice Sound Effect - 8-Bit Retro Video Game Sound Effects 1

Controller Images - u/crustolium
